title: LF ACtive Support Duo silver/Gold Wanna Form a Botlane Syngery
body: Hey Guys im Goa Cancer Supp but ill be changing name in future xD but anyways looking for a support around silver/gold who wants to game alot in the holidays and do all nighters or play all day either one just wanna climb wanting someone who dedicated enough to join me add me if keen mic will bring more chances with discord or teamspeak. Add Goa Cancer supp ill be on all night tonight and future nights cheers non toxic please also wanting to improve and develop with each other.

replies.body: Feel free to add me in game i finished G4 last season and just got put in S2 after promos.
I'm down. I currently am bronze but will be in silver shortly.
